text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump President & vice president of USA are on tv admitting that China F*CKED US. If you did your job and protected your butthole, nothing would have gone in. Even coronavirus! You cannot expect a foreign country to protect us. It is the same China your amazing predecessor dealth with!
